juliabloomquist: Thanks for your openness again and again! You are an inspiration!

thejuliemonroe: Wow. I just now realized the same is true for me. My parents loved me (still love me) and they thought what they were doing was best. But I realized now that I had zero clue what consent was... wow. Thank you for sharing.
ianawi: yes 💯💯💯💯 👏 Consent even still a mystery "nowadays" (within last decade) ... once I had been dumped by a bf who was technically raping me while I slept, it took a lot of distance and therapy to admit that this cool evolved "feminist" dude was having non consensual sex with me. idreamofy0gini: Same here. Im glad my parents didn't "allow" it, but I wish they would have explained a lot more.
